vote.title: To authorize the Director of Public Service to request that the Director of the Ohio Department of Transportation (ODOT) establish a reasonable and safe prima facie speed limit of 25 miles per hour on the roadways within the Downtown District within the core pedestrian areas, if they are not already posted as such; to repeal any and all speed limit ordinances and resolutions on said roadways; and to declare an emergency. ($0.00)
vote.description: A motion was made by Lourdes Barroso De Padilla, seconded by Nicholas Bankston, that this Ordinance be Approved. The motion carried by the following vote:
